content: this legal text involves a notary named xxx who has performed duties for a private limited company called n the company paid a fee for a declaration minuteholding the text outlines the progress of a divorce case between mr x and mrs x the parties have requested a divorce by mutual consent and have made agreements regarding the division of property financial accounts securities and pension savings they have also addressed tenancy rights debts taxes and future assets and liabilities the parties have agreed to a lump sum payment to settle any remaining accounts and have renounced their inheritance rights the text explains that the parties have fully divided their assets and have made a final settlement agreement they have agreed not to address any grievances from their marriage and not to cause harm to each other the parties have waived the right to receive maintenance allowance from each other and have agreed to file the divorce proceedings in the court where they currently reside they are aware that the divorce will take effect once their marriage certificate is notified the text also mentions the tax implications and the responsibility for paying additional duties the parties declare the estimated value of the property and request a reduced rate for the distribution the text concludes with the confirmation of the parties identities and the accuracy of the information provided in the deed the parties acknowledge their rights and obligations and have had the opportunity to review and make amendments to the document the deed has been signed by the parties in the presence of the notary
